status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Request description

With iTunes the user can access and add/delete/modify files included in the Application Data Directory folder. Customer is asking to be able to detect from their app if any changes have been made from iTunes in the folder.
fields.summary: iOS: enable the user to detect if any changes has been made to the shared folder using iTunes
